name: Russian Bus Simulator 3D
description:
Do you like driving big vehicles? Then you have to try this Russian Bus Driving game! Smooth controls, realistic vehicle physics and challenging gameplay. Try to be the best Russian Bus Driver in real Russian City!

Meet our player Russian Ivan who is new to the City and want to explore it, but has no cash. Tired of robbery and car theft, waiting for the police chase, Ivan took a job at the bus driver. Help Ivan to become the best driver of the coolest bus in the Russian city!

Features:
- Realistic bus physics
- Cool real passengers
- Traffic cars system - cool russian auto such as Lada and Uaz
- Different buses to drive, such as PAZ, LIAZ and MAZ
- Real Russian City
- Tilinting, buttons and steering wheel controls.
- Interior Camera and others sided
- Incredible 3D graphics
- Challenging system
- Very easy to use controls

Want to feel like a Russian Bus Driver? Russian Bus Simulator 3D is for you!
